sentence.Network_en: Jacobsen based his conclusion on an analysis of the decay of samarium-147 into neodymium-143.
sentence.Network_cn: 雅各布森得出的结论是基于对钐-147衰变成钕-143所作的分析。

sentence.Network_en: USES: Used for making metallic samarium , permanent magnetic material and electronic devices, etc.
sentence.Network_cn: 用途: 供制作金属钐 、 永磁材料、电子器件等.

sentence.Network_en: Application of samarium diiodide in mediating intramolecular cyclization reactions was reviewed.
sentence.Network_cn: 综述了二碘化钐在分子内环化反应中的应用.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from samar(skite), a mineral in which its spectrum was first observed (named after Samarsky, a 19th-cent. Russian official) + -ium

means.word_mean: 1. a gray lustrous metallic element of the rare earth group; is used in special alloys; occurs in monazite and bastnasite

auth_sentence.content: Samarium and neodymium are essential materials for high-powered magnets used in electrical generators used by wind turbines.
